title: Kristi Noem: 2 million undocumented immigrants removed under Trump
shortDescription: Two million undocumented immigrants have been removed in the first year of Trump's second term, according to Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem.

title: Trump 'has our backs,' Hegseth says as he defends boat strikes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is backing Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth amid escalating criticism from Congress over military strikes on alleged drug boats.

title: Trump says Melania isn't thrilled about ballroom construction noise
shortDescription: President Trump said his wife, first lady Melania Trump, isn't thrilled about the noise from the construction of his massive White House ballroom.

title: Trump vows to overhaul Dulles airport with 'amazing' design
shortDescription: Trump and Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said they plan to overhaul Dulles airport near Washington, DC, which they said was "badly designed."

title: See moments from President Trump's December cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a meeting with members of his Cabinet at the White House on Dec. 2, 2025.

title: Al Gore urges Democrats to send a 'shock wave' in Tennessee race
shortDescription: The former vice president made a rare return to the campaign trail as he delivered an impassioned plea to Tennesseans to vote for Democrat Aftyn Behn.

title: Trump calls 'affordability' a 'Democrat scam' in promoting lower costs
shortDescription: Trump promoted lower inflation and tariffs at a Cabinet meeting where he called Democratic complaints about 'affordability' a 'scam.'

title: Donald Trump and when it's time to get an MRI
shortDescription: The White House released a statement on Dec. 1 from President Donald Trump's physician regarding his MRI scan. Here's what to know about the test

title: Does Aftyn Behn really hate Nashville, oppose tax cuts and bully ICE?
shortDescription: Democratic Congressional nominee Aftyn Behn’s opponents have criticized her for bragging about “bullying” ICE agents. What really happened?

title: Costco sues the Trump administration over tariffs
shortDescription: The popular wholesale store Costco sued the Trump administration over tariffs. They are seeking a refund of paid duties.

title: Trump pardons cocaine kingpin who ruled Honduras
shortDescription: Trump said Nov. 28 that he planned to pardon the former Honduran leader, and a White House official confirmed Dec. 2 that the pardon had been issued.

title: Trump to make announcement. Watch livestream.
shortDescription: President Trump is making an announcement after holding a meeting with members of his Cabinet on Tuesday, Dec. 2. Watch it live here.

title: What Trump's recent Education Department shake-up means for students
shortDescription: Six new deals shift major Education Department programs to other agencies. Here’s what it means for school funding, special ed and student aid.

title: Michael Dell to pump $6 billion into 'Trump accounts' for newborns
shortDescription: Billionaire tech executive Michael Dell is contributing more than $6 billion to President Trump's accounts for newborn babies.

title: What to know about the Tennessee election getting national attention
shortDescription: Tennessee's 7th congressional district has become competitive after polling tightened between Republican Matt Van Epps and Democrat Aftyn Behn.

title: Mark Kelly hits back at Trump, Pentagon investigation
shortDescription: Mark Kelly alleged Donald Trump has “no regard for the rule of law" after the Pentagon announced an investigation into the Democratic senator.

title: White House releases Trump’s MRI scan
shortDescription: The White House released details of President Donald Trump's MRI scan, which it says was part of his "comprehensive executive physical."

title: Trump faces scrutiny over strike on suspected drug boat
shortDescription: Lawmakers said in both parties said they were reviewing the Trump administration's attacks on alleged drug smuggling boats.

title: What to look for in Tennessee's election
shortDescription: The Tennessee congressional election results could indicate how well Republicans could do in the midterms.

title: White House gets decorated for Christmas. See photos, video.
shortDescription: The White House's Christmas decorations, curated by first lady Melania Trump, embody the American spirit of generosity, patriotism and gratitude.

title: White House unveils patriotic holiday decor
shortDescription: Melania Trump reveals patriotic White House decorations honoring military families and America’s 250th anniversary.
